title: Mobile Science Learning Design Based on Tikanga Māori Principles

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Building a learning environment reflecting Māori cultural values and operating flexible schedules for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the Tikanga Māori principles while exploring scientific concepts using mobile devices.
Learners can propose solutions to scientific problems from a Māori cultural perspective through group collaborative projects.
Learners can collect, analyze, and document scientific experiment data using smartphone-based learning tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
